tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE lookalike_audience (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    interests TEXT,
    location VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE audience_mapping (
    mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    segment_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES lookalike_audience(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (segment_id) REFERENCES audience_segments(segment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE lookalike_audience (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    interests JSON
);

CREATE TABLE similar_users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    similar_user_id INT,
    similarity_score FLOAT,
    last_interaction DATE,
    active BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE audience_segments (
    segment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    segment_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE audience_insights (
    segment_id INT,
    audience_size INT,
    gender_distribution JSON,
    age_distribution JSON,
    interests_distribution JSON,
    FOREIGN KEY (segment_id) REFERENCES audience_segments(segment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE lookalike_audience (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name STRING,
    age INT,
    gender STRING
)

CREATE TABLE customer_data (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    email STRING,
    phone_number STRING,
    address STRING
)

CREATE TABLE purchase_history (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customer_data(customer_id),
    purchase_amount DOUBLE,
    purchase_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE audience_interests (
    interest_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    interest_name STRING,
    audience_id INT REFERENCES lookalike_audience(id)
)

CREATE TABLE campaign_performance (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audience_id INT REFERENCES lookalike_audience(id),
    conversion_rate DOUBLE,
    performance_date DATE
)
